events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for days.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a delivery delay due to late shipping and stalled tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to a delivery support agent to investigate the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and Iâ€™ll do my best to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and my shipping address is 45 Green Street, Springfield.
Thanks for the info. I contacted the courier, and your package was delayed but should arrive within three days. We will monitor the shipment closely.
Okay, I appreciate your help and hope it arrives soon. I'll keep an eye on the tracking updates.
We consider this matter resolved for now. Please reach out if your order does not arrive within the next few days.
Just checking in to confirm if your package has arrived and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know.
Yes, the package finally arrived today. Thank you for your prompt support and follow-up.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and feel free to contact us for any further assistance.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about the support you received.
